com.db4o.tools
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  com.db4o.tools.Logger

public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Logger class to log and analyse objects in RAM.

This class is not part of db4o.jar!
It is delivered as sourcecode in the path ../com/db4o/tools/
